languages.text: {n}По вашей руке, все еще зажатой в челюсти кибергоргульи, пробегают мурашки. Сервитор несколько раз трясет головой, словно... пожимая вам руку. Его зубы терзают и без того израненную плоть.{/n} "///Номос рады. Номос тоже любят понимать".

traits.locale_text: {n}По вашей руке, все еще зажатой в челюсти кибергоргульи, пробегают мурашки. Сервитор несколько раз трясет головой, словно... пожимая вам руку. Его зубы терзают и без того израненую плоть.{/n} "///Номос рады. Номос тоже любят понимать".

languages.text: {n}Shivers run up your hand, which is still trapped inside the cybergargoyle's jaws. The servitor nods its head a few times, as if it is... shaking your hand. Its teeth rake your already wounded flesh.{/n} "///Nomos are glad. Nomos enjoy understanding too."
languages.original_text: {n}По вашей руке, все еще зажатой в челюсти кибергоргульи, пробегают мурашки. Сервитор несколько раз трясет головой, словно... пожимая вам руку. Его зубы терзают и без того израненную плоть.{/n} "///Номос рады. Номос тоже любят понимать".

traits.locale_text: {n}Shivers run up your hand, which is still trapped inside the cybergargoyle's jaws. The servitor nods its head a few times, like it is... shaking your hand. Its teeth rake your already wounded flesh.{/n} "///Nomos are glad. Nomos enjoy understanding too."

{n}Shivers run up your hand, which is still trapped inside the cybergargoyle's jaws. The servitor nods its head a few times, as if it is... shaking your hand. Its teeth rake your already wounded flesh.{/n} "///Nomos are glad. Nomos enjoy understanding too."

{n}Shivers run up your hand, which is still trapped inside the cybergargoyle's jaws. The servitor nods its head a few times, as if it is... shaking your hand. Its teeth rake your already wounded flesh.{/n} "///Nomos are glad. Nomos enjoy understanding too."

languages.text: {n}サイバーガーゴイルの口の中に捕らわれたままのあなたの手に震えが走る。サーヴィターはまるで…あなたと握手するかのように数回頭を振った。その歯はすでに傷を負っているあなたの手の肉を引っ掻いた。{/n}「///ノモスは嬉しいです。ノモスは理解するのが楽しいです」
languages.original_text: {n}Shivers run up your hand, which is still trapped inside the cybergargoyle's jaws. The servitor nods its head a few times, as if it is... shaking your hand. Its teeth rake your already wounded flesh.{/n} "///Nomos are glad. Nomos enjoy understanding too."

traits.locale_text: {n}サイバーガーゴイルの口の中に捕らわれたままのあなたの手に震えが走る。サーヴィターはまるで…あなたと握手するかのように数回頭を振った。その歯はすでに傷を負っているあなたの手の肉を引っ掻いた。{/n}「///ノモスは嬉しいです。ノモスは理解するのが楽しいです」

languages.text: {n}你的手仍然被困在电子滴水嘴兽的下颚里，突然你感觉到一阵颤抖。机仆点了几下头，似乎是在……和你握手。它的牙齿紧紧咬着你的伤口。{/n}“///诺莫斯很高兴，诺莫斯也喜欢理解。”
languages.original_text: {n}Shivers run up your hand, which is still trapped inside the cybergargoyle's jaws. The servitor nods its head a few times, as if it is... shaking your hand. Its teeth rake your already wounded flesh.{/n} "///Nomos are glad. Nomos enjoy understanding too."

traits.locale_text: {n}你的手仍然被困在电子滴水嘴兽的下颚里，突然你感觉到一阵颤抖。奴工点了几下头，似乎是在……和你握手。它的牙齿紧紧咬着你的伤口。{/n}“///诺莫斯很高兴，诺莫斯也喜欢理解。”

languages.text: {n}Ein Kribbeln läuft deine Hand hinauf, die noch immer in den Kiefern des Cybergargoyles gefangen ist. Der Servitor nickt mehrfach mit dem Kopf, als würde er ... dir die Hand schütteln. Seine Zähne zerscheuern dein schon verwundetes Fleisch.{/n} "///Nomos sind froh. Nomos haben auch Freude am Verstehen."
languages.original_text: {n}Shivers run up your hand, which is still trapped inside the cybergargoyle's jaws. The servitor nods its head a few times, as if it is... shaking your hand. Its teeth rake your already wounded flesh.{/n} "///Nomos are glad. Nomos enjoy understanding too."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein Kribbeln läuft deine Hand hinauf, die noch immer in den Kiefern des Cybergargoyles gefangen ist. Der Servitor nickt mehrfach mit dem Kopf, als würde er ... dir die Hand schütteln. Seine Zähne zerscheuern dein schon verwundetes Fleisch.{/n} "///Nomos sind froh. Nomos haben auch Freude am Verstehen."

languages.text: {n}Des frissons parcourent votre main, toujours coincée dans les mâchoires de la cybergargouille. Le servitor hoche la tête à plusieurs reprises, comme s'il... vous serrait la main. Ses dents labourent votre chair déjà à vif.{/n} « ///Nous sommes contents. Nous aimons comprendre aussi. »
languages.original_text: {n}Shivers run up your hand, which is still trapped inside the cybergargoyle's jaws. The servitor nods its head a few times, as if it is... shaking your hand. Its teeth rake your already wounded flesh.{/n} "///Nomos are glad. Nomos enjoy understanding too."

traits.locale_text: {n}Des frissons parcourent votre main, toujours coincée dans les mâchoires de la cybergargouille. Le servitor hoche la tête à plusieurs reprises, comme s'il... vous serrait la main. Ses dents labourent votre chair déjà à vif.{/n} « ///Nous sommes contents. Nous aimons comprendre aussi. »

languages.text: {n}Un escalofrío te recorre la mano, que todavía sigue atrapada en las fauces de la cibergárgola. El servidor asiente varias veces con la cabeza, como si estuviese... estrechándote la mano. Sus dientes desgarran tu maltrecha carne.{/n} «///Nomos se alegran. Nomos también disfrutan comprendiendo».
languages.original_text: {n}Shivers run up your hand, which is still trapped inside the cybergargoyle's jaws. The servitor nods its head a few times, as if it is... shaking your hand. Its teeth rake your already wounded flesh.{/n} "///Nomos are glad. Nomos enjoy understanding too."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un escalofrío te recorre la mano, que todavía sigue atrapada en las fauces de la cibergárgola. El servidor asiente varias veces con la cabeza, como si estuviese... estrechándote la mano. Sus dientes desgarran tu maltrecha carne.{/n} «///Nomos se alegran. Nomos también disfrutan comprendiendo».

languages.text: {n}Hâlâ sibergargoylun çenesinde sıkışmış olan eline bir ürperti yayılıyor. Hizmetör, başını birkaç defa sallayıp âdeta... Âdeta seninle el sıkışıyor. Dişleri, hâlihazırda yaralanmış etini tırmalıyor.{/n} "///Nomos mutlu oldu. Nomos da anlamaktan hoşlanır."
languages.original_text: {n}Shivers run up your hand, which is still trapped inside the cybergargoyle's jaws. The servitor nods its head a few times, as if it is... shaking your hand. Its teeth rake your already wounded flesh.{/n} "///Nomos are glad. Nomos enjoy understanding too."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hâlâ sibergargoylun çenesinde sıkışmış olan eline bir ürperti yayılıyor. Hizmetör başını birkaç defa sallıyor âdeta... Âdeta seninle el sıkışıyor. Dişleri, hâlihazırda yaralanmış etini tırmalıyor.{/n} "///Nomos mutlu oldu. Nomos da anlamaktan hoşlanır."
